Uses of Class
math.function.FunctionR1Vec3

  • Packages that use FunctionR1Vec3 
    Package Description
    animation
    Provides controllers that can animate a scene by changing characteristics of the scene objects through a channelized interface.
    examples.controller  
    math.function
    Provides functions interface for different kind of functions
    math.function.util
    Provides different functions, like interpolation functions (Bezier, Catmull-Rom, PiecewiseLinear) and some example functions that could be used as a motion path (Gauss curve, Helix curve, SawTooth curve,...).
    particles  
    scenegraph
    Provides classes for all scene graph components: cameras, lights, geometries, materials, colors with all their attributes.
    scenegraph.util

    • Uses of FunctionR1Vec3 in examples.controller

      Constructors in examples.controller with parameters of type FunctionR1Vec3 
      Constructor Description
      FuncRootController​(FunctionR1Vec3 func, Channel transChannel, Channel rotChannel, AbstController.RepeatType loopMode)
      Die Vec3-Werte die ein Funktion func liefert wird dem transChannel übergeben. * Der Frenet-Frame wird als Rotationsmatrix interpretiert und dem Channel rotChannel übergeben
      FuncRotController​(FunctionR1Vec3 func, Channel rotChannel, AbstController.RepeatType loopMode)
      Die Vec3-Werte die ein Funktion func liefert werden als Eulerwinkel interpretiert und daraus eine Rotationsmatrix erzeugt.
